nodes.text: A  Gand engineer was captured by the Galactic Empire. Sometime between 5 BBY and 4 BBY, and was forced to build a new Imperial ship model titled the Blackburn. The Spectres later rescued her and changed the blueprints for the Blackburn into a drawing of a bantha.
The Gand engineer was mentioned in the desktop game, Star Wars Rebels: Chopper Chase which was released on November 11, 2016.
